Text:
3 GIGAbytes?! Hey AssBone, did ya ever hear of "compression"..? Or h.264? Oh, it looks like you did hear of h264 bec that's what this is encoded with, which makes the large size even more ridiculous.

Btw, no one wants video at 1920x1080, even for Star Wars. Please limit to 720xYYY or 1024xYYY at the most. Thanks.

Thanks for your time and effort!  : )

@michaelrwatson find a posting that meets with your asinine demands and keep your dumbass comments to yourself!
